text: The flag of Monterrey () It is colored white and the coat of arms in the center. The emblem has a diameter of three-quarters the width of the stripes. The ratio of the flag is 4:7. ==Design and symbolism== Name Color HEX Code White #FFFFFF ==Related pages== * Monterrey ==References== Monterrey Category:Monterrey Monterrey Category:Flags with coats of arms
title: Flag of Monterrey
